name: Women in Technology Galway
blurb:
This meetup gives us an opportunity to mingle and meet with other female professionals working in the IT industry. If you are interested in pursuing a career in IT, learning about new technologies, contributing to open source, or getting involved in technical workshops, then come support this group. Let's build a strong innovative community lead by women in Galway.

Follow us on Twitter: [twitter.com/techwomengalway](https://twitter.com/techwomengalway)
